about_the_game:
Demo available now! Play the tutorial and first town of the game. Meet the main characters and embark on your journey with Jin and Jel!

The Speck family's restaurant is in shambles after its sous chef, Juniper Speck, mysteriously vanishes in the night. News of sudden monster attacks spreads throughout the country, and a mega popular fast food chain pops up in a sleepy town. Meanwhile, Jin Speck and an unusual talking slime are on the run after being framed for murder. Follow their journey as they sleuth through various small towns, working undercover at mom and pop restaurants and learning new cooking techniques along the way. Will you uncover the mystery behind the missing chef and save the family restaurant?

Uncover secrets in a beautiful and mysterious world while you puzzle, cook, and fight your way through different towns to find your missing sister and clear your name.

Gather evidence by talking to NPCs to uncover the mystery behind Juniper’s disappearance

 Interview suspicious characters and find the lies and inconsistencies in their claims during interrogation minigames

 Solve puzzles, crack codes, and discover hidden areas and confidential files

 Don various disguises and outfits while on the run from the authorities

 Explore multiple towns each with unique monsters, biomes, and regional cooking recipes

 Play cooking minigames to create consumable dishes with special properties to enhance your abilities

 Equip chef's knives, rolling pins, balloon whisks, and more kitchen utensils to unlock new ways of cooking and combat

Attack and dodge slimes, mushrooms, golems, and other classic monsters in 2D side-scrolling perspective
